name: The Pit (itch) (Kuasynei)
description:
Controls

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump/Fly

Left-Click - Shoot

A reuploaded version of a game made during the 2015 game Jam with some game breaking bugs fixed and movement fixes. The theme of this Game Jam was: "What do we do now?".

Original Page with Credit: http://globalgamejam.org/2015/games/pit

The game ends when you reach the golden state. You gain the ability to shoot once you grow some arms.
